member_organisations:
Yves Samson is member of: 
> ISPE (www.ispe.org) 
- Member of the french Affiliate board 
> GAMP (see www.ispe.org) 
- Member of the GAMP European Steering Committee 
- Co-founder and chair of GAMP Francophone 
> European Compliance Academy (www.gmp-compliance.org) 
 
Yves Samson acts as trainer for the European Compliance Academy (ECA) and its supporting organisation (Concept-Heidelberg).
fields_of_interest: Public Health, Digital economy and society
eu_initiatives: Submitting comments on the draft version of EudraLex documents and related European Directives.
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations

goals__remit:
Kereon AG is an independent company with over 15 years of experience, and mainly dedicated to support its customers to achieve efficiently GxP regulatory compliance, in particular e-Compliance (see also computerised system validation). 
Kereon AG's customers cover both small and mid-size regulated companies as well as global acting pharmaceutical companies, including equipment suppliers and service providers of the pharmaceutical industry.
relevant_communication:
> Comment of draft regulation provided by the European Commission resp. EMA 
> Presentation of regulatory texts during conferences 
> Training delivery about GxP compliance and e-Compliance
